title: For the role-stealing argument
body: Is it possible to add a role-stealing report option, and have everyone's role shown like in champ select, so that it is manually reviewed? Or is everyone just going to hit the role-stealing report button just to get riot's attention and screw the whole idea up? :/

replies.body: Would be a nice thing to have imo
It would only work if Riot didn't tell us how it works.
